tool_description: With this API, you can view all airports worldwide, their runways, and all airlines operating there.
name: Airports, Runways, and Airlines Worldwide API
title: Airports, Runways, and Airlines Worldwide API
tool_name: Airports, Runways, and Airlines Worldwide API

api_list.name: airports/airlines/details
api_list.description: The endpoint that lists the IATA, ICAO, logo, and the airports they operate in for airlines.

api_list.name: airports/airlines
api_list.description: The API endpoint that lists airlines.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://airports-runways-and-airlines-worldwide-api.p.rapidapi.com/airports/airlines"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "airports-runways-and-airlines-worldwide-api.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: airports/details
api_list.description: It provides airport information based on the entered IATA code.

api_list.name: airports/list
api_list.description: It lists airports according to the specified country. If no value is entered, it lists all airports.

api_list.name: airports/countries
api_list.description: It is used to list registered countries.
